Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2008 02:00PM Lorriec wrote: I also took Premarin for 10 years. i had my first dose while still in the hospital recovering from my total hysterectomy.  I also developed breast cancer. Luckily I was diagnosed early and as a result had a bilat mastectomy, no further treatment. I also feel this is a result of premarin taken every single day for 10 years!  I am so angry!  Good luck to you in your new journey. ( yet again)
Posts.Title: Metastatic Breast Cancer vijmom otter
